mapper.select: /* custDashboard.getConsultingList 고객 계약 상품 리스트 조회 */ SELECT DISTINCT C.CONTRACT_ID , CT.CONSULTING_ID , CT.CONSULTING_NM ,B.BUYER_ID, B.BUYER_NM FROM TBL_EXP_CONTRACT C ,TBL_EXP_CONSULTING CT ,TBL_EXP_BUYER B WHERE 1=1 AND C.CONSULTING_ID = CT.CONSULTING_ID AND C.BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID} AND C.BUYER_ID = B.BUYER_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CONSULTING_NM
